original_text:
Sacrifice and offering you did not desire—
    but my ears you have opened—
    burnt offerings and sin offerings you did not require.
korean_text: 주께서 내 귀를 통하여 내게 들려 주시기를 제사와 예물을 기뻐하지 아니하시며 번제와 속죄제를 요구하지 아니하신다 하신지라

sentences.original_text: Sacrifice and offering you did not desire
but my ears you have opened
burnt offerings and sin offerings you did not require
